views.markdown:
This item is now Free.

See larger Screenshots below..

This item is now Free. Add hiding keyboard dictation key
Add option to hide the Today view or notifications view in NC
Add option to hide grabber from NC
Add option to hide table seperators system wide
Add option to warn if flash is active in camera before taking picture

Bug fixes
Fix issue with settings not being preserved
Fix hiding No Sim disabling Carrier text
Fix CC being transparent if dock was set to transparent after 1.4.1
Fix CC background color not working after 1.4.1
Localizatin fixes in settings
Fix dimmed snapshot cards for landscape applications
Localization For Default Strings
Reconfigure slider cell look
Seconds on LockScreen shouldn't flicker anymore
Fix Instagram saving for Instagram 9.0

Optimizations for iOS 9.3

Fix settings crash on 9.3 Fix edge case crash

Fix GameCenter banner not hiding
Add No Sim Alert Hiding
Add Icon Resizing
- Add customizable blur strength for CC and NC
- Fix blank badge displayed on phone and facetime app when colorizing is enabled.
- Fix icons not undimming after force touching an icon with no shortcuts
- Fix hiding airdrop section from ControlCenter
- Fix lockscreen clock not displaying seconds
- Fix animation slow factor not setting correctly
